Package tournament

Class PlayerDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • tournament.PlayerDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PlayerDriver
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Creates timed threads for the Player. Called by GameMaster when updating the player and getting the player's action.
    Author:
    Marcus

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      PlayerState state
      Used to know which Player method to call

      void run()
      GameMaster will create a thread to run this class that will call a Player subclass' methods.

        Constructor used for Player's initialize() and makeAction() methods

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        GameMaster will create a thread to run this class that will call a Player subclass' methods. Any exceptions or time outs will only harm this thread and will not affect GameMaster
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
